thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice stay
thread.title_full: Nice stay - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Wayne S
title: Nice stay
text:
This hotel is conveniently located near the hotel. It has a shuttle that runs regularly and will save you a $20.00 cab fare. The room was very nice, the staff was delightful. The young men at the valet were knowledgeable about the local surroundings, which let me explore a bit.
Room Tip: There are rooms that overlook the water. Just remember tides go in and out. Half the time it is a mu... See more room tips Green Features: Environmentally friendly, recycle containers located throughout.
